system.description:
With a hand sign and a releasing of a jasmine, you summon a flowerbed of corpses and jasmines.

Spend 1 Beat to choose a tile in range 4 and summon a burst 1 jasmine field from it. All enemies in the jasmine field suffer -1d to all their defenses.

Riverside Flowerbed: Spend 2 Beats to increase the field to burst 2 and make it difficult terrain for all enemies.

Grand Petals Choking The Sailendra: Spend 3 Beats. Whenever an enemy is attacked while in the flower field, heal 1.
system.flavor: Sampaga or sampaguita are jasmines that represent death and also purity.
